#summary DRAFT working with the experimental eclipse directory.
 
= Step one =
Refer to the main GWT documentation for how to get your formatter and checkstyle setting set up correctly.

= Step two  =
Set the linked resource GWT_HOME to point to the gwt version you want to use.
Set the linked resource GWT_TOOLS to point to the gwt or gwt incubator tools dir you want to use.

= Step three =
import the gwt-incubator-resources dir.  If you are on windows, import it from incubator-resources-windows. If you are in linux import it from incubator-resources-linux.

= Step four =
cp eclipse-experimental/incubator-template/.* .

= Step five =
import the new eclipse project from the source of your trunk
